name: Mahjong Fish!
description:
Match and remove tiles in the addictive Mahjong Solitaire adventure, which contains the BRAND-NEW designed tiles and themes.
This free and fun Mahjong game is also known as Mahjongg Trails, Shanghai Mah Jong, Mahjong Solitaire, Mahjong Titan, Top Mahjong, Majong.

==============How To Play==============
Find and match pairs of identical Mahjongg tiles. Remove all tiles to complete a board.

==============Features==============
- Over 1000 boards
- Beautiful designed style
- Classic gameplay
- Free hints
- Daily challenges
- Free themes
- NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM!

Have fun playing Mahjong Fish!
